medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of a message and to transmit identifying number and the further specification of the message type (in data element 1001: Document name code), such as Loading report, Discharge report.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate a date and/or time applying to the whole message, such as date and time of document or message issue.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or processable supplementary information, such as: - change information

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify a reference relating to the whole message, and its date and/or time.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to express a reference which applies to the entire message, such as: - container discharge/loading order reference - reference to previous message

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and/or time related to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to indicate the main carriage means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment identifying the voyage of the vessel relevant to the message (main transport).

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify the date(s) and time(s) related to the main carriage means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a relevant reference number, such as: - shipping - syndicate - marketing organization - conference code

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A segment group to identify locations related to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to specify a location related to the means of transport such as places and ports of arrival and departure.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the date(s) and time(s) related to a location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to identify a party and related contacts.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address, and function, and other addresses, such as: - message recipient - message sender - ordering customer - ordering customer agent

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department of a message sender and/or message recipient, such as: - information contact

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation:
Segment group 6: SG9-EQA-PIA-COD-HAN-SG11-SG12-NAD A group of segments to specify containers either loaded or discharged; in the latter case - only in case of shortlanded - the group of segments is to specify containers that had to be discharged (according to the discharge order message).
In a normal discharge report and load report message the container details are only required if they differ from the details given in the respective order message. In case of overlanded containers this group will contain the full container details giving as much information as possible. In case of shortlanded containers this group will only contain the container prefix and number.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment identifying a container, container size/type. The equipment status may be e.g. overlanded, shortlanded, import, export.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a relevant reference number, such as: - container sequence number - booking reference number

medi:segment.name: Nature of cargo
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GDS, A segment to show the broad classification of the goods within a container for operational and general information purposes.

medi:segment.name: Transport movement details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMD, A segment to indicate a Full Container Load (FCL) or a Less than Full Container Load (LCL).

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify a date and time related to the equipment, such as: - Date and/or time of actual loading or discharge - CSC expiration date (International Convention for Safe Containers)

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to identify a location or country related to the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to identify a location or country related to the equipment, such as: - stowage cell - (final) place/port of discharge - transhipment place - place of delivery - country of origin/destination

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify date(s) and time(s) related to a location.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying a physical measurement related to the equipment, such as: - gross weight

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment specifying physical dimensions related to the equipment, such as: - gross dimensions - off standard dimension general - off standard dimension left - off standard dimension right - off standard dimension back - off standard dimension front

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A segment group to identify transport related temperature settings.

medi:segment.name: Temperature
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMP, A segment which identifies the transport temperature setting of the container.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment to specify the transport temperature range setting of the container.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment identifying a seal number related to the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify supplementary information related to the equipment, such as: - blockade reason - government inspection service - container loading remarks - container remarks - container order information - additional remarks concerning the container - container safety convention plate - continuous examination program (ACEP)

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to specify percentages related to the equipment such as percentage humidity.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments to specify dangerous goods details.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment to identify the UN-number and the class of the dangerous goods loaded in the container.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to give additional information regarding dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements of the dangerous goods, such as: - net net weight.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments to specify contact information.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department to be contacted regarding dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to specify communication details of the dangerous goods contact.

medi:segment.name: Attached equipment
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQA, A segment to identify clip-on units, such as: - generator sets

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment to specify a commodity code relating to goods in the container.

medi:segment.name: Component details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COD, A segment to specify the details of the components of transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment to specify handling instructions related to the equipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments to specify damage details related to the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Damage
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DAM, A segment to specify equipment damages, such as the point of the damage on the equipment, and the type of damage.

medi:segment.name: Component details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COD, A segment to specify component details of the damaged equipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments to specify the planned on-carriage details in case this message is a discharge report message.

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment to identify the on-carriage transport details of the mode, means of transport by which the container will depart after being discharged.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date/time relating to the on-carriage transport, such as arrival or departure date/time.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments to identify locations related to on- carriage transport.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location related to the transport details, such as: - place of departure

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date/time relating to the on- carriage transport, such as arrival.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to specify a related address or party, such as: - container operator

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment to specify the number of containers in the message, explicitly given by the sender.
